{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant document that discusses the width of connective tissue around an implant is the [Comparative animal experimental study on the importance of the surface structure for the stability of extension implantations]. According to this study, under extreme functional stress there occurs a mobility of the implants with the formation of a broad connective tissue zone. Under less stress, the connective tissue layer narrows itself further if the surface is porous.", "answer_choice": "D"}
